panels.title: Welcome to Public Forum
panels.text: Welcome to Public Forum! Public Forum is a partner event where teams of two debate about whether to adopt or reject a resolution, usually surrounding domestic or foreign policy. A new resolution is released every month.

panels.title: Slides
panels.text: You can find all of our lectures on Google Drive

panels.title: Sample Cases
panels.text: Sample cases from last year can be found on Google Drive as well
